title: Crypto.com Platform Halts Withdrawals After Suspicious Account Activity
sub_head: CEO says no user funds were lost; company to offer full report after investigation is completed
body:
The online platform crypto.com suspended customer withdrawals for about 14 hours on Monday, after reports of unauthorized activity in the accounts of some users, the company said.
No user funds were lost, Chief Executive Kris Marszalek said on Twitter late on Monday. While he didnâ€™t offer details of the incident, he said the company will offer a full report after it completes an investigation.
